attributes.action: tax workers £1 every three months and devide the money between charities
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
What I prepose is to tax every working person £1 every three months. This lump sum can then be divided between a number of charities so they can continue to do good work.

This also means that they wont have to aggressively drum up donations via mass media and save money on advertising campaigns, putting the money to better use.
